fields.description: The plural name for your custom post type e.g. Books, Movies, Events.
fields.label: Name (plural)

fields.description: The singular name for your custom post type e.g. Book, Movie, Event.
fields.label: Name (singular)

fields.description: The name of the post type used in code. If left blank, this will be auto populated using the name field above.
fields.label: Post Type Key

fields.description: A short descriptive summary of what the post type is.
fields.label: Description

fields.description: Whether the post type is hierarchical (arranged in a tree-like structure). If true, then a parent can be specified for each custom post type. E.g. pages are hierarchical, posts are non-hierarchical.
fields.label: Hierarchical

fields.description: Which registered taxonomies will be associated to this post type. The taxonomy meta boxes will be visible when managing this post type.
fields.label: Taxonomies

fields.description: Comma separated list of additional custom taxonomies you want to associate to this post type
fields.label: Custom Taxonomies

fields.description: This string isn't used on non-hierarchical types.
fields.label: Parent Text Label

fields.description: Used to define default values for publicly_queriable, show_ui, show_in_nav_menus and exclude_from_search
fields.label: Public

fields.description: Whether to generate a default UI for managing this post type
fields.label: Show Admin UI

fields.description: Whether to show the post type in the admin menu and where to show that menu. Note that show_ui must be true.
fields.label: Show In Admin Menu

fields.description: A top level page like 'tools.php' or 'edit.php?post_type=page'
fields.label: Show In Admin Menu Custom Page

fields.description: The position in the menu where the post type should appear
fields.label: Menu Position

fields.description: A custom menu position that is not one of the standard values in the dropdown
fields.label: Custom Menu Position

fields.description: The url to the icon to be used for this post type menu. Defaults to the posts menu icon
fields.label: Menu Icon

fields.description: Whether this post type is available for selection in the Appearance -> Menus admin screen.
fields.label: Show In Navigation Menus

fields.description: Whether post_type queries can be performed from the front end
fields.label: Publicly Querable

fields.description: Whether to exclude posts with this post type from search results
fields.label: Exclude From Search

fields.description: Enables post type archives. Will generate the proper rewrite rules if rewrite is enabled
fields.label: Has Archive

fields.description: False to prevent queries, or provide a custom string value to use for this post type. Default is the post type
fields.label: Query Variable

fields.description: Can this post_type be exported using WordPress' import/export feature?
fields.label: Can Export

fields.description: Rewrite permalinks with this format. False to prevent rewrite. Default is to use post type as slug.
fields.label: Rewrite

fields.description: A unique string to use before the post title in the permalink.
fields.label: Custom Rewrite - Slug

fields.description: Allows permalinks to be prepended with front base (example: if your permalink structure is /blog/, then your links will be: false->/news/, true->/blog/news/)
fields.label: Custom Rewrite - With Front

fields.description: Whether the post type should have feeds for it's posts.
fields.label: Custom Rewrite - Feeds

fields.description: Whether post type archive pages should be paginated. This is only useful if archives are enabled for this post type.
fields.label: Custom Rewrite - Pages

fields.description: Use the default capabilities, or take full control over specific capability names.
fields.label: Advanced Capabilities

fields.description: Allows you to define a custom set of capabilities, which are permissions to edit, create, and read your custom post type. If you are unsure, then leave this at the default : post
fields.label: Capability Type

fields.description: Whether someone can create and edit a specific post of this post type
fields.label: Edit Post Capability

fields.description: Capability that allows editing posts of this post type
fields.label: Edit Posts Capability

fields.description: Capability that allows editing of others posts
fields.label: Edit Other Posts Capability

fields.description: Capability to grant publishing of these types of posts
fields.label: Publish Posts Capability

fields.description: Capability that controls reading of a specific post of this post type
fields.label: Read Post Capability

fields.description: Capability to allow reading of private posts
fields.label: Read Private Posts Capability

fields.description: Capability that grants the privelege of deleting posts of this post type
fields.label: Delete Post Capability
